/** * Calculate the sequence alignment Strings for the whole alignment. This * method creates a sequence alignment where aligned residues are in * uppercase and unaligned residues are in lowercase, thus providing a more * compact way to represent the alignment. *

* Blocks are concatenated in the order returned by * {@link MultipleAlignment#getBlocks()}, so sequences may not be * sequential. Gaps are represented by '-'. Separation between different * Blocks is indicated by a gap in all positions, meaning that there is a * possible discontinuity. * * @param alignment * input MultipleAlignment * @return String for each row in the alignment, giving the 1-letter code * for each aligned residue. */
